com.atakmap.android.navigation.widgets

Class FreeLookMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.atakmap.android.navigation.widgets.FreeLookMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, MapComponent, MapItem.OnGroupChangedListener, PointMapItem.OnPointChangedListener, MapMenuEventListener

    public class FreeLookMapComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
implements MapMenuEventListener, PointMapItem.OnPointChangedListener, MapItem.OnGroupChangedListener, android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener
    Contains widget and data management for the 3D free-look capability For the gesture part of the implementation see MapTouchController
